idea:
Swift Robotics is a team of engineers from India and the UK, developing technology in the fight against COVID-19 in India through innovation in design. Times are uncertain and our health and safety is everyone’s utmost concern. Our mission is to be at the forefront of technology in the fight against COVID-19 through the power of disinfection will accelerate the speed at which we return to normality.


There is an urgent need in India for technology that can be used in households and businesses in order to disinfect surfaces, while being safe and easy to use. We have created a tried and tested device that is guaranteed to destroy the COVID-19 virus in any room up to 20m2, by using Ultraviolet light to destroy DNA, RNA and proteins in virus cells, causing these cells to die directly and fail to reproduce and replicate. Any room where our device is used will be disinfected to a large extent, hence possibly saving lives. Our device kills 99% of viruses within 2 minutes as per our most recent testing. Our solution is unique in terms of its pricing and ease of use. We want everyone to use our products to bring back a sense of normality while fighting against COVID-19.
name: Swift Robotics

idea:
Good Fettle private limited is in the business of healthy food and dessert options for customers. The primary product it deals in is ice creams.

We are carrying the business of promoting  good health and well-being for people by means of sale of  nutritional food products and imparting related knowledge  through cafes, packaged meal subscription programs.
name: GOOD FETTLE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Blooms health and hygiene has started in the year 2020 under the influence of prime ministers campaign of Make in India. Currently I manufacture Handmade soaps in Mumbai. My soaps are natural. Free from Surfectants, SLS, SLES & parabens. I have started this company with an Idea to make Indian made products like personal care & Home care to another level. I wish to discuss my idea with prospective investors & gain their attention for manufacturing soaps & other home care & personal care products in India
name: Blooms Health and Hygiene India

idea:
phone networking

Mobile networking refers to technology that can support voice and/or data network connectivity using wireless, via a radio transmission solution. The most familiar application of mobile networking is the mobile phone.
name: Phone

idea: Ready to eat Plant based food product alternatives that are the right mix of healthy and nutritious for you

idea: Our objective is to develop software and mobile applications that acts as middle-ware that cater to a large user base. Most of our solutions work on Software as a Subscription model to create easy understanding and value for our stakeholders.

idea:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Good day,


We are into supply of ship spares, provisions/Bond and all kind of ship stores in all Indian , UAE, Singapore, Yemen, Egypt, Sudan , Suez canal area & WAF Ports to various ship owners/managers.


Proactive Ship Supply Pvt Ltd ” acts as a provider of first class Ship supply Services at competitive prices.


We like to be in your approved vendor list and serve your good vessels for supply of ship’s stores/Spares.


Attached herewith kindly find our company’s profile for brief introduction.


 Services We Offer:-


Provision Stores (Dry & Fresh)

Bonded Stores

Various Technical stores(Deck, Engine & Cabin)

Ship spares of various machineries like Main Engine, Generators, Boilers, Compressors, Purifiers, AC & Air Compressors, Various pumps etc.

Lub oil


Having been active in this challenging business environment, we have developed excellent relationships with our customers, this is complemented by our team of professionals with extensive experience in the fields of shipping and logistics.
name: PROACTIVE SHIP SUPPLY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Aye learning Labs is a Wholesome Learning and Development Company.  We deploy capacity building programs for children in preschools, schools, individual learning hubs and now, online at our own app too. These programs are 21st century builds, rooted in child psychology, engaging enough for kids and wholesome focused to develop multiple competencies in children.


The program aims to develop child in a well-rounded way.

1. Our Wholesome Learning Framework of learning and facilitation which employs a healthy blend of Left-Right brain learning traits

2. These capacity building programs develop competencies of a child from age 3 till 15 which is pivotal in their founding and formative years of development

3. We use multi-benefit skill building products which are designed in areas of Neuro-Cognition, Academic Power Learning, Sensory Acuity, Experential Learning,  Multiple Intelligence Theory, Emotional Wellness and Physiological Wellness.
name: Aye Learning Labs
